channel.title: Meta on Shrike's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Meta on Shrike's Blog

item.title: Welcome
item.description:
“Hello world!” I suppose that’s how you’re supposed to open the first post on a programmer’s blog right?

If that wasn’t enough, here’s hello world in some other languages (okay, I’ll admit it, this is just me testing things now):

// C
#include <stdio.h>

int main(int argc, char const *argv[]) {
  printf("Hello world!\n");
  return 0;
}

// Rust
fn main() {
  println!("Hello world!");
}

# Python
print('Hello world!')

-- Haskell
main :: IO ()
main = putStrLn "Hello world!"
